content:
I'm recompiling after long time a R4 based IG and the build now fails with this error

Liquid Exception: Could not locate the included file 'list-simple-medicationstatements.xhtml' in any of ["C:/msys64/home/Giorgio/_github/fhir-ips/temp/_includes"]. Ensure it exists in one of those directories and, if it is a symlink, does not point

If I look in the tmp folder I see list-simple-medicationXYZ.xhtml file, but only for R5 medication resources (e.g. medicationusage) but not the medicationStatement...

Any Suggestion ?
Is the IG set up to gen for R4 (not 'current')?
the version in the ig.json is set to "version": "4.0.1". Is this what you mean ?
Yes. Do you have profiles that are pointing to MedicationUsage? I don't understand how you could be getting those as artifacts if you haven't specifically defined them...
me either :-) .... I've just recompiled the IPS IG that doesn't use anywhere medicationUsage but only medicationStatements
I'll wait @Rob Hausam will recompile its version and if all is right on his side see what are the differences...
The only change I suppose I made was in the ig.json file, changing the version form 4.0.0 (no more recognized by the publisher) to 4.0.1
in fact, this is a bug that's been waiting to go off for a long time. Your description is perfectly correct. The IG publisher is iterating the wrong version of the resource list. fixed next release
